name: ZenZoi Fountain Pen Ink Cartridge Refills- 24 Bulk Premium Blue Case- Professional Grade, International Size, Non-Toxic Ink- Smooth, Blotch-Free Writing for Luxury Pens – German Nibs (Blue)
short_description: About this item PROFESSIONAL-GRADE BLACK INK REFILLS- Zenzoi puts together a high-end ink cartridge refill package that will prolong the amazing handwriting experience of your luxury fountain pens. Enjoy a 24-case of international-size professional-grade ink refills, suited for both professional and artistic use. FLAWLESS WRITING EXPERIENCE-For calligraphy or every-day use, our ink cartridges offer a smooth, blotch-free handwriting experience that is flawless. Keep enjoying your fountain pens with no breaks in the ink flow and cherish each time you put pen to paper. ABUNDANCE OF QUALITY- Instead of going through the hassle of ordering ink refills so frequently, you can now enjoy a 24-piece case that will keep your pen flowing for quite a while to come. With a perfect ratio of quality and quantity, our box delivers in all fronts and surpasses any expectations. INTERNATIONAL FIT- Our fountain pen refill cartridges were designed for the luxury pen owner’s ultimate convenience. Zenzoi standard international size ink refills fit into most standard fountain pens, especially German Schmidt Nibs available on the market. Cartridges fit German and Japanese 2.3mm feed suction. PLANET-CONSCIOUS- Our commitment to the environment is part of who we are- all Zenzoi ink refills use non-toxic ink contained in eco-friendly plastic to minimize harm to the environment. Choose between the classic Blue or Black colors selection.
product_description: Zenzoi Fountain Pen Ink Refill Cartridges Zenzoi puts together an exclusive collection of fine inks for your luxury fountain pens in one, 24 piece case for the ultimate convenience. Whether you are a business man attached to their fountain pen, or a calligrapher- our bulk case brings amazing quality combined with quantity in a value-packed deal you can’t overlook. Maintain a Flawless Handwriting Experience Our ink ✅ Delivers a silk-smooth glide on paper with no breaks or blotches ✅ Offers an uninterrupted flow ✅ Is non-toxic Packed in an eco-friendly plastic cartridge that is International-Standard size, it will fit most fountain pens available on the market. Forget About Constantly Buying New Office Supplies Fountain pens are by nature a luxury experience, however having to find the right refills always is a hassle. With our 24-piece deal, you can keep enjoying your fountain pen with no interruptions and whenever you run out, you simply grab a new refill from the box that can be conveniently stored away. Available in Multiple Colors From the standard-issue classics of Black and Blue to a multi-color selection, we have everything you need. Find the one that’s right for you and away with constantly having to buy new 2-pack or 4-pack refills only to run out when you need it the most. Click Add to Cart Today & Sign Off on Your Entrance to the Zenzoi Luxury Club!

name: Bunch O Balloons Multi-Colored (10 Bunches) by ZURU, 350+ Rapid-Filling Self-Sealing Instant Water Balloons for Outdoor Family, Children Summer Fun - Total (100 Balloons) Colors May Vary
short_description: About this item QUICK-FILL: Unleash fun with speed & ease this summer with Bunch O Balloons; Fill & Tie 100 Water Balloons in 60 Seconds. Simply attach the stem to a hose, fill them big & shake to make hundreds of Water Balloons in seconds. Yup, it really is that easy NO MORE TYING: Bunch O Balloons patented O-ring technology means there is no tying necessary. These innovative Water Balloons Self-Seal, leaving you more time to play! Fill your water balloon battles with a spark of color with the brightest, most vibrant water balloons ever! SUSTAINABILITY: Bunch O Balloons stems and caps are now made from certified and traceable, recycled plastic. The balloon pieces are made from ‘natural rubber’, a material derived from plants! Join us in unleashing a more sustainable summer. BUNCH O BALLOONS PROMISE: Unleash Summer Fun with the speed and ease; Fill and Tie 100 water balloons in 60 seconds! Enjoy the ultimate water balloon fight with your friends, family, rivals, and teammates this summer!
product_description: Fill and Tie 100 water balloons in less than 60 seconds with these sensational self-tying water balloons! With innovative O-Ring technology and Rapid Fill capabilities, say goodbye to the stress and mess of filling individual water balloons and say hello to never ending splash out loud fun! Simply connect, fill and make hundreds of water balloons with no hand-tying.
